additional_prohibitions: Candidates for federal or statewide public office.
Paid campaign staffers on Congressional campaigns.
Paid employees of Democratic and Republican Party organizations.
Paid employees of Political Action Committees (PACs) and “Super PACs” (independent expenditure only political committees).
Paid employees of major polling organizations.
Existing members of Congress, including those not running for re-election.
Existing paid staffers of members of Congress.
Household members and immediate family members (siblings, children, and parents) of any of the above.
Any of the above listed institutions themselves.
title: House winner
